Vendor Privacy Policy & Terms of Service

Last updated: December 8, 2025

1. Introduction

Welcome to GoSnel ("we," "our," or "us"). This document outlines the privacy practices and terms of service that govern your use of our vendor platform and partnership with GoSnel.

By registering as a vendor partner with GoSnel, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined herein.

2. Vendor Data & Privacy

2.1 Information We Collect

To operate your restaurant on the GoSnel platform, we collect the following information:

A. Business Information

  • Restaurant Details: Name, location, operating hours, cuisine type
  • Contact Information: Email, phone number, registered address
  • Financial Details: Bank account information for settlements (processed securely)
  • Licensing & Documentation: Business license, health permits, tax ID

B. Menu & Operational Data

  • Menu items, pricing, and availability
  • Inventory management data
  • Order history and performance metrics
  • Delivery partner assignments and tracking

2.2 How We Use Your Data

We use vendor data to:

  • Process and fulfill food orders
  • Manage payments and settlements
  • Provide platform analytics and insights
  • Communicate important updates and support
  • Comply with legal and regulatory requirements

2.3 Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your financial and business information. All payment processing is handled by secure third-party providers (Stripe, etc.).

3. Vendor Terms of Service

3.1 Partnership Agreement

By registering as a vendor, you agree to:

  • Maintain accurate and up-to-date menu and restaurant information
  • Process orders within agreed timeframes
  • Maintain food safety and hygiene standards
  • Comply with all local health and business regulations

3.2 Commission Structure

GoSnel charges a commission fee on each order as follows:

  • Commission percentage varies by location and restaurant tier
  • Detailed breakdown provided in your vendor dashboard
  • Settlements processed weekly to your registered bank account

3.3 Order Management

  • You must accept or reject orders within 2 minutes of receipt
  • Orders must be prepared according to customer specifications
  • You are responsible for food quality and accuracy
  • Our platform facilitates delivery; we do not control delivery times

3.4 Prohibited Activities

Vendors agree NOT to:

  • Offer lower prices on the GoSnel platform than on other platforms
  • Encourage customers to order outside the platform to avoid commission
  • Engage in fraudulent activity or misrepresent your business
  • Violate intellectual property rights or our brand guidelines
  • Provide inaccurate health permits or licensing documents

3.5 Account Suspension & Termination

GoSnel reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account if you:

  • Violate health and safety regulations
  • Receive excessive customer complaints or poor ratings
  • Fail to maintain accurate information on your profile
  • Engage in prohibited activities outlined above

3.6 Ratings & Reviews

Customer reviews and ratings are displayed publicly. You have the right to respond to reviews professionally. Fake reviews or review manipulation is strictly prohibited.

3.7 Intellectual Property

All GoSnel branding, technology, and platform features are proprietary. You agree to use the platform solely for operating your restaurant business on GoSnel.

4. Dispute Resolution

In case of disputes:

  1. First attempt resolution through our vendor support team
  2. If unresolved, disputes may be escalated to formal mediation
  3. All disputes are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates

5. Contact Us

For vendor-related questions or concerns, please contact us:

  • Vendor Support: vendors@gosnel.com
  • Privacy Issues: privacy@gosnel.com
  • Business Inquiries: business@gosnel.com

GoSnel Technologies
Dubai, United Arab Emirates
Website: https://gosnel.com
